languages.text: При каждом {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} существа по врагу начинается необратимый процесс заражения его тела и разума. После смерти зараженного врага существо поднимает его в качестве своего безвольного слуги.
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy, it starts the irreversible process of corrupting their mind and body. After the corrupted enemy death, the creature forces it to arise as a mindless servant.

languages.text: Whenever the creature {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, it starts the irreversible process of corrupting their mind and body. After the corrupted enemy's death, the enemy will be forced to rise as a mindless servant.
languages.original_text: При каждом {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} существа по врагу начинается необратимый процесс заражения его тела и разума. После смерти зараженного врага существо поднимает его в качестве своего безвольного слуги.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the creature {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy, it starts the irreversible process of corrupting their mind and body. After the corrupted enemy's death, the enemy will be forced to rise as a mindless servant.

Whenever the creature {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, it starts the irreversible process of corrupting their mind and body. After the corrupted enemy's death, the enemy will be forced to rise as a mindless servant.

Whenever the creature {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, it starts the irreversible process of corrupting their mind and body. After the corrupted enemy's death, the enemy will be forced to rise as a mindless servant.

languages.text: 每当此生物{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}击中{/g}敌人时，都会以不可逆转的过程腐化敌人的身心。遭到腐化的敌人死后会复活，变成没有意识的傀儡。
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, it starts the irreversible process of corrupting their mind and body. After the corrupted enemy's death, the enemy will be forced to rise as a mindless servant.

traits.locale_text: 每当此生物{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}击中{/g}敌人时，都会以不可逆转的过程腐化敌人的身心。遭到腐化的敌人死后会复活，变成没有意识的傀儡。

languages.text: この生物が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}するたびに、敵の心身を堕落させる不可逆的なプロセスが始まる。堕落した敵の死後、敵は強制的に心なきしもべとしてよみがえる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, it starts the irreversible process of corrupting their mind and body. After the corrupted enemy's death, the enemy will be forced to rise as a mindless servant.

traits.locale_text: この生物が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}するたびに、敵の心身を堕落させる不可逆的なプロセスが始まる。堕落した敵の死後、敵は強制的に心なきしもべとしてよみがえる。

languages.text: Cuando esta criatura {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo, inicia el proceso irreversible de corrupción de su cuerpo y mente. Tras la muerte del enemigo corrupto, se levantará convertido en sirviente sin mente.
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, it starts the irreversible process of corrupting their mind and body. After the corrupted enemy's death, the enemy will be forced to rise as a mindless servant.

traits.locale_text: Cuando esta criatura {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a un enemigo, inicia el proceso irreversible de corrupción de su cuerpo y mente. Tras la muerte del enemigo corrupto, se levantará convertido en sirviente sin mente.

languages.text: Wenn die Kreatur einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, beginnt sie den unumkehrbaren Prozess, dessen Körper und Geist zu verderben. Nach dem Tod des verdorbenen Feindes ist dieser dazu gezwungen, als willenloser Diener aufzuerstehen.
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, it starts the irreversible process of corrupting their mind and body. After the corrupted enemy's death, the enemy will be forced to rise as a mindless servant.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn die Kreatur einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, beginnt sie den unumkehrbaren Prozess, dessen Körper und Geist zu verderben. Nach dem Tod des verdorbenen Feindes ist dieser dazu gezwungen, als willenloser Diener aufzuerstehen.

languages.text: Chaque fois que la créature {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi, elle déclenche sur le corps et l'esprit de celui-ci un processus irréversible de corruption. Après sa mort, l'ennemi corrompu devient un serviteur décérébré.
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, it starts the irreversible process of corrupting their mind and body. After the corrupted enemy's death, the enemy will be forced to rise as a mindless servant.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que la créature {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} un ennemi, elle déclenche sur le corps et l'esprit de celui-ci un processus irréversible de corruption. Après sa mort, l'ennemi corrompu devient un serviteur décérébré.
